<Heading

></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/message/send-media"}
  context={"endpoint"}
></MethodEndpoint>

Enviar media (imagen, video, audio)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{
    required: true,
    content: {
      "application/json": {
        schema: {
          type: "object",
          required: ["number", "mediaUrl", "mediaType"],
          properties: {
            number: { type: "string" },
            mediaUrl: { type: "string" },
            mediaType: { type: "string", enum: ["image", "video", "audio"] },
            caption: { type: "string" },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{ "200": { description: "Media enviada" } }}
></StatusCodes>
